title: Who do you think is Annoying
body: From my recent games i found some champions very annoying to deal with and i would like to see the community's opinons

replies.body:
Yasuo and Riven are annoying purely due to how often I see their faces.

Otherwise, not really, same for the others.

The only one atm that I legitimately consider to be annoying beyond all hell is Illaoi. Because unlike champions that all have a certain rhythm of their own, this one just throw shit at you and things just happen, both in great quantities. Fk that's annoying.
what about fiora's W of screw your cross map ez and ashe ult, or her R heal of haha, u died so ur jungler cant kill my anymore

> [{quoted}](name=monkiinator135,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Ygif4cH3,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-12-27T01:03:12.970+0000)
>
> what about fiora's W of screw your cross map ez and ashe ult, or her R heal of haha, u died so ur jungler cant kill my anymore

Fiora, maybe.

But definitely not Ezreal or Ashe imo, at least not their ulti, since they have to actually aim if they're going to snipe you across map.

lol calmelelele, its camilelelele
and i said yasuo just because he is easy to lane against with some people (notice i said lane, not fight late game)
such as sion, viktor, anivia sometimes
